title: Kennen ult has bugged visual in aram[Gameplay]
body: Whenever the enemy Kennen ulted, my team and I could hear the ult, but were unable to see it's visual effects.

replies.body:
Hey Rogue736! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating. This doesn't appear to happen in every game, which is why it's taking is a bit to nail a fix for this one down.
